item.description:
Something different for Thursday this week! Neil found Milano for Karaoke. Its your basic pizza place, but good pizza, chicken, seafood and prices.

Its a skinny little place, right at the merge of exit 6 & 7 in Nashua. But I've been there after volleyball @Holman and its nice.

For parking, if you're coming from the highway, come exit 7. Then you can curb park right along Milano or turn the corner onto Broad St and try curbing there. I think there is a parking lot just beyond that. Coming from downtown Nashua, just park along the cemetery. (they're very quiet - well its near Halloween ;-)

Tom c603-521-8392
item.name: Karaoke @Milano House of Pizza, Nashua
